import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter, HashRouter, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class ExplDemande extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { dateDemande: '', dateRdv: '', heure: '', nomClient: '', service: '', nomTravailleur: '', montant: '', etat: '' } } componentDidMount() { let id_demande = this.props.location.state.id_demande; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_snaii/GetDemandeById.php?id=' + id_demande).then(res => { console.log(res) this.setState({ dateDemande: res.data.dateDemande, dateRdv: res.data.dateRdv, heure: res.data.heure, nomClient: res.data.nomClient, service: res.data.nomService, nomTravailleur: res.data.nomTravailleur, montant: res.data.montant, etat: res.data.etat }) }) } render() { return (

Informations Demande

); } } export default ExplDemande;
